name: Rotatic Lite
description:
Rotate tiles and transform into artworks!
Rotatic Lite is a brilliant image-matching puzzle game filled with comprehensive visual content and unique gameplay.
Goal is to match tiles with the given artwork. Tap the diamond-shaped pieces to rotate them individually on its own axis, position correctly and transform pieces into the artwork with one final twist: Slide your finger across the screen and experience the magic!
Play through beautifully designed artwork collections with no pressure, just relax and focus.
Features
· Free to Play!
· Mind-blowing levels
· Stunning minimalistic visual design
· Astonishing animation, music and sound design
· No time or move limits
· No internet connection required
Enjoy!
